title: Nostalgia NRMO11PK6A 1000 Watt Power Retro Countertop Microwave Oven Easy to Clean with Removable Glass Turntable-Child Safety Lock-12 Programs-Digital Clock, 1.1 Cu Ft, Pink
description: Add vintage charm to your kitchen with the Nostalgia Retro Countertop Microwave Oven. With its sleek retro design and 1000 watts of cooking power, this microwave combines both style and functionality. It features 12-pre programmed cooking settings, a glass rotating table for even cooking, a bright LED display, and 5 power levels ideal for all of your cooking needs. The 1.1 cubic feet capacity is perfect for preparing meals of various sizes. Cook with confidence knowing that the 2-action child safety lock will keep everyone safe while operating. Its easy to use, simple to clean, and adds vintage charm to your cooking space.
